name: Astralia
description:
Astralia is a game I made with some of the people of Haunted Tie, Pipette Inc & Dimi3D during the Global Game Jam 2016.

The theme was "ritual" and this was the short description we added to the game : In this initiation rite, travel the astral plan to fight the spirits of the nature and become a man

This game was inspired by Punch out, where you need to guess your opponent paterns and then hit him in the right time

Global Game Jam link
